thread.title: NTC Promotes Danny Byrnes to Key Executive Position

author: cnbc.com
title: NTC Promotes Danny Byrnes to Key Executive Position
text:
Leading sales executive moves up to take responsibility for company marketing.
PALM HARBOR, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Nationwide Title Clearing (NTC), the leading post-closing services provider for the nation’s largest financial institutions, investors and servicers, announced today that Danny Byrnes has been promoted to Vice President of Sales and Marketing for the company, effective immediately. Byrnes previously served NTC as Vice President of Sales.
“Danny’s performance has led to nothing short of a meteoric rise in sales for NTC,” said John Hillman, NTC’s CEO. “Danny has been instrumental in planning and executing the strategy that has achieved a 350% growth since his career started with our company. With his in-depth knowledge of both our customers and our capabilities, it makes sense to also give him oversight and control of the marketing function.”
Byrnes joined the company in 2011 and spent a very successful two years as the firm’s Director of Sales before being promoted to Vice President of Sales in 2013. Since then he has helped broaden the scope of services offered by initiating and customizing solutions for clients. His experience and knowledge of complex sales, sales management, marketing and product management is invaluable to NTC.
Byrnes also has deep technology sector aptitude, having spent nine years in the industry as a sales executive and successfully running sales teams for several specialty software companies. In all, he has over 30 years of sales experience across several different industries, including the entertainment industry, where he worked as an agent/manager for some of the world’s largest musical acts for 15 years.
About NTC
Nationwide Title Clearing, Inc. (NTC) was founded in 1991 and has grown into a national leading post-closing services provider for the residential mortgage industry. NTC provides a wide range of services to the nation’s top mortgage lenders, servicers and investors as well as various government entities.
NTC’s mission is to deliver Life of Loan services with the highest level of accuracy partnered with the mortgage banking industry to protect homeowners while also preserving the integrity of the nation's land records.
For more information, visit the company’s website at www.nwtc.com .
